name: Senior Consultant to Power & Utilities team
description:
Services provided by department:

  • Strategy development/review: corporate, business portfolio, particular market/segment, market entry;
  • Market analysis and forecasting
  • Organizational design
  • Business processes design and optimization, cost-cutting
  • Business transformation
  • Project management

Knowledge and technical skills:

  • Knowledge of economics and finance, general business acumen
  • Strong industrial knowledge (Telecom&Media / Power&Utilities / Education) – Operations, Strategy, Marketing and Sales
  • Information collection and analysis methods and techniques
  • Quantitative and qualitative data analytics
  • Good report writing and presentation (MS PowerPoint) skills
  • Strong knowledge and working experience with PC
  • Russian –fluent, English – advanced/fluent (both oral and written)

Education and experience:

  • Higher education (Russian or equivalent) preferably in Economics, Finance or Business Administration
  • 3+ years of work experience in consulting and/or industrial environment
  • MBA / ACCA / CPA / CFA papers passed is an advantage
  • Work experience in management consulting is an advantage

Soft skills:

  • Established communication skills
  • Strong team player
  • Leadership skills
  • Ability to operate in multitask environment
  • Business writing skills (both in Russia and in English)

Other requirements:

  • Availability for overtime work and tough deadlines
  • Willingness to travel (Russia and abroad)

You will get

  • Competitive salary
  • Broad career and professional development opportunities
  • An opportunity to take part in a variety of complex and innovative projects
  • Support in getting professional qualifications
  • Medical insurance (dental services are included)
  • Life insurance
  • Flexible approach to work schedule
  • Additional paid calendar days of vacation
